original_title: How Porn is Destroying You and Our Country
overview: Our young men are suffering from a manufactured addiction to internet pornography, the results of which are invariably swept under the rug. To pursue the truth, you must take control of your desires. As long as they can enslave you to your own desires, they can continue to distort the truth and you will be none the wiser.
title: How Porn is Destroying You and Our Country
